        attrStyle

      • attrStyle(element: HtmlElement; attributes: varargs[CssAttribute]): untyped

Sugar module

This module includes some sugar syntax for creating CssElement, CssAttribute, HtmlElement and other usage.

Example:

import websitegenerator/sugar
import websitegenerator

# Creating new, empty `HtmlElement`:
var header: HtmlElement = "h1"[]

# Setting content:
header => "Some content"

# Css:
var stylesheet: CssStyleSheet = newCssStyleSheet("styles.css")

let classCenter: CssElement = newCssClass("center",
    "text-align" := "center",
    "margin" := "auto"
)

stylesheet.add(
    classCenter,
    "h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6"{
        "text-align" := "center",
        "text-decoration" := "underline"
    }
)

# Class assignment:
header -> classCenter

header.addStyle(
    "text-align" := "left" # Overriding for a single element
)

assert $header == """<h1 class='center' style='text-align:left;'>Some content</h1>"""
